This game has caused many tears and shouts of joy. The content creators for this game are amazing, the community is a complete spectrum of every gamer there is, and the actual gameplay can be extremely rewarding. I am mostly a killer main, but the almost infinite variation in builds and meme plays keeps the game fun. BHVR is constantly updating the game with bug fixes, new content, and changes to the game mechanics. 10/10 would cry getting bullied by a 4 man ttv SWF :(

I love this game so much; let me just say that first of all. I've been playing this game since 3 months after its initial release. I simply CANNOT recommend a game that puts SBMM in their game that doesn't need it. It makes the game even more boring than it was, and makes the game the same every match regardless of what you do as survivor/killer. All it has become is the same perks every match, same tactics from both sides too. I haven't purchased a single thing on this game since Oni, protesting the game's state since then by withholding my money. PLEASE REMOVE SBMM DEVS. I honestly have been going to other games instead of Dead by Daylight because when I come home, I want to at least semi-relax, yet can't have ANY relaxation playing this game since SBMM.

A very good game. For a gamer like me who rarely plays horror games, I find it hard to adjust but overall it was a fun experiences. Playing with friends makes it much worthy.

The game is decent, but the people in it are very much assholes. Literally just camp the hooks, and never allow you to have fun as a survivor. I would not play this old game, and would not recommend it to anybody.
I've taken out a mortgage on my house to buy more characters I don't play. 11/10.
